title: Sorting Dictionary by Values in Python
description: Dictionaries are a fundamental data structure in Python that allow you to store key-value pairs. However, sometimes you may need to sort a dictionary by its values instead of its keys. In this challenge, you will be tasked with creating a function that sorts a dictionary by its values.
